segments.text: I see the sunlight highlighting the kitchen details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is carefully wiping the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is spilling everywhere unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems totally unaware of the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balanced on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her treat with open palm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating on this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the whole sneaky scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the bushes and path look perfectly trimmed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss hides real dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds just a bit longer.
segments.speaker: PAR
